dcterms:creator: M. Arjovsky
L. Bottou
I. Gulrajani
D. Lopez-Paz
dcterms:description: The Colored MNIST task is designed to create high correlations between image colors and true labels, leading to spurious features that can mislead learning algorithms. The correlation is reversed in the test domain, making it a challenging dataset for evaluating domain generalization methods.
dcterms:title: Colored MNIST

dcterms:creator: I. Gulrajani
D. Lopez-Paz
dcterms:description: DomainBed is a benchmark that includes multiple synthetic and real-world datasets for assessing the performance of domain adaptation and generalization algorithms. It provides a rigorous framework for evaluating various strategies in domain generalization.
dcterms:title: DomainBed

dcterms:creator: M. Ghifary
W. B. Kleijn
M. Zhang
D. Balduzzi
dcterms:description: Rotated MNIST is a variant of the MNIST dataset where images are rotated at various angles. It is used to evaluate the robustness of models against transformations and is a common benchmark for domain generalization.
dcterms:title: Rotated MNIST

dcterms:creator: C. Fang
Y. Xu
D. N. Rockmore
dcterms:description: VLCS is a dataset that includes images from four different domains: Caltech101, LabelMe, SUN09, and VOC2007. It is used for evaluating domain generalization algorithms by providing diverse visual contexts.
dcterms:title: VLCS

dcterms:creator: D. Li
Y. Yang
Y.-Z. Song
T. M. Hospedales
dcterms:description: PACS is a dataset that includes images from four different domains: art, cartoons, photos, and sketches. It is designed to evaluate domain generalization algorithms by providing a variety of artistic styles.
dcterms:title: PACS

dcterms:creator: H. Venkateswara
J. Eusebio
S. Chakraborty
S. Panchanathan
dcterms:description: OfficeHome is a dataset that includes images from four domains: art, clipart, product, and real. It is used for evaluating domain generalization algorithms by providing a mix of synthetic and real-world images.
dcterms:title: OfficeHome

dcterms:creator: S. Beery
G. Van Horn
P. Perona
dcterms:description: TerraIncognita is a dataset that includes images from various locations, designed to evaluate domain generalization algorithms by providing diverse geographical contexts.
dcterms:title: TerraIncognita

dcterms:creator: X. Peng
Q. Bai
X. Xia
Z. Huang
K. Saenko
B. Wang
dcterms:description: DomainNet is a large-scale dataset that includes images from six domains: clipart, infograph, painting, quickdraw, real, and sketch. It is used for evaluating domain generalization algorithms by providing a wide variety of visual styles.
dcterms:title: DomainNet
